long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TextHatch is a browser extension that provides AI-powered (GPT-3.5) text generation and editing tools for any text field on any website. It can help you save time and improve the quality of your writing.

With TextHatch, you can:

- Generate new text: Enter a topic or keyword and let TextHatch create high-quality content.
- Edit existing text: Use TextHatch's editing tools to transform your writing into something more polished and refined.
- Summarize long articles: Get a quick summary of key points with TextHatch's TLDR feature.

TextHatch is easy to use and works seamlessly with all websites.
